directions: Combine the sausage, peppers, celery, scallions, tomatoes, rice, chicken broth, Cajun seasoning, bay leaves, thyme and cayenne in a 6-quart slow cooker.
Cover and cook on low, 4 hours, adding the shrimp during the last 20 minutes of cooking. Discard the bay leaves. Serve topped with parsley.
ingredients: 1 pound andouille sausage, sliced 1/2 inch thick
1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined
title: Jambalaya
